review: Set up was very intuitive. The wifi setup worked immediately. Browsing and selecting movies is also easy. I have not tried it in a hotel yet.
author: Josef

review: Its decent, but not great. I don't like how they mix paid shows and movies in with actual "free" ones (ones that come with Prime membership). I'd prefer to have an option to completely disable / hide any and all paid TV / movies.Most important to me is that you will not be able to stream local content from your local network to this device. It just won't happen.The only way you can get around that is by paying for a separate Plex membership then installing the plex app on this device.Choosing to not allow local media streaming is a big bust for me.
author: Adam H

review: It was simple to install on our Directv system and Comcast internet. Just followed the directions.
